title: T206 Nap Lajoie batting PR-FR sold
author: t206kid

posts.post_title: T206 Nap Lajoie batting PR-FR sold
posts.post_content:
Nice card - bunch of creases but no major issues.  

sold

Sweet deal, thanks Jay. I posted about Nap over in the 2021 collecting goals thread. I guess my on and off (mostly off) approach over the last 30 years that this card has alluded me.

Now let’s get some John Frill UZITs up for sale LOL

Now let’s get some John Frill UZITs up for sale LOL[/QUOTE]
Congrats! That was one that took me a while - I think it was number 515 or 516? It's a great pickup for you!
